channel.title: How do i change what a server says when u first login
channel.description: like mine says in the chat box "welcome to satans isle" how can i change it :confused:

item.title: How do i change what a server says when u first login
item.dc:creator: @0wned_server_pl0x 0wned server pl0x
item.source: How do i change what a server says when u first login

item.title: How do i change what a server says when u first login
item.dc:creator: @_mnchmn2 ~mnchmn2~
item.description:
@_mnchmn2 wrote:

or if u want u could put players name instead of the name this is mine that i have

sendQuest("@cya@Welcome "+playerName+"", 8145);

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change what a server says when u first login

item.title: How do i change what a server says when u first login
item.dc:creator: @reeper620 reeper620
item.description:
@reeper620 wrote:

Look at what the message says and open up client.java, then search “Welcome to Satan Isle” and there should be Welcome to Satan Isle high-lighted. Click of the search box and delete the sentance. After that type in your Server name (Example: Welcome to ScapeScape). click the X on client and click “Yes” when it asks you to save. Then compile it and log on.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change what a server says when u first login

item.title: How do i change what a server says when u first login
item.dc:creator: @I_0ne_H1t_K0 I 0ne H1t K0
item.description:
@I_0ne_H1t_K0 wrote:

Or On Some Sources It Could Be Different Like If It Was

 Welcome To Hitler Is Darth Vader

You Basically Just Go Into “Client.Java” Search For The Welcome Message And Change It So You Would Search For

 Welcome To Hitler Is Darth Vader

And Just Change It To Whatever

Read full topic

go to client java and hit ctrl-f and then type welcome to satan isle then u click enter and just change that
